translation: Depending on the prompt meeting of the general attorneys of the municipalities, the solution to business of vital interest to the republic, which has long been reserved to be submitted for the consideration of this Council of patriots, which deemed itself convened as soon as the relocation of the government to this capital was verified, but which did not happen, the Excellent Sir Your Graces commands.
